msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides except at the top where it has been torn off. Some damage has occurred with some lacunas stretching verticallly from the bottom. One kollesis in the middle between the two columns of writing. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)

Menches, brother of the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Phaesis, son of Pekmeis, alias Heuremon and Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)

Nemesas, slave of Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)

Petaus, son of Petaus, grandson of Petheus, mother Isis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 209)
Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Kastor, son of Kastor, grandson of Apollonios, mother Heraklous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Sisois, slave of Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Heraklas, fatherless, mother Taonnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 167)
Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Sabinus, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)

Ptolemaios, son of Harpakysis, grandson of Satabous, mother Tasokonopis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Sabinus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother of Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tahorion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Petaus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 209)
Anchophis, son of Horos, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolemas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " [(Column) 14]:;(Tybi) 17 likewise:;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnis, drachmas 4;;Menches, brother of the same mother, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, obols 28;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis, alias Heuremon and Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;(in left margin: remaining .[.] 4?) Horion, son of Mysthes, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 20;;Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios, drachmas 12;;12th year the same ? copper drachmas;in total for the day, drachmas 64, obols 19, of which 12th year obols 20.;(Tybi) 18 likewise:;Heras alias Aphrodisios, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Apollonarion, drachmas 8;;Nemesas, slave of Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Pakysis, son of Melanas, grandson of Pakysis, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petaus, 20;;Sisois, slave of Tasoucharion, drachmas 20;;in total for the day, drachmas 76, obols 27;;(Tybi) 19 likewise:;Heraklas, fatherless, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 12;;Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous, obols 28;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Sabinus, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 12;;Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Naaraus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpakysis, grandson of Satabous, mother Tasokonopis, drachmas 8;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, obols 28;;in total for the day, drachmas 60, obols 28;;(Tybi) 20 likewise:;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, obols 20;;Sabinus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother of Tapetheus, drachmas 16;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tahorion, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 12;;Anchophis, son of Horos, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolemas, drachmas 8;;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatres, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Horos, mother Herais, drachmas 4."
